Package it.seba.juno.player

Interface Player

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPlayer, HumanPlayer, NpcPlayer
public interface Player
Uno card game player.
Author:
Sebastian Rapetti

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<UnoCard>
    getCards()
    Returns the list of cards owned by the player.
    int
    getCardsNumber()
    Returns the number of cards the player have in hand.

    Returns the name of the player.

    Returns the type of the player, human.

    Returns the type of the player, npc.

    Returns if the player is the winner of the match.
    boolean

    Returns if the player have one card in hand and must say UNO!
    void
    takeCard(UnoCard card)
    Used to give one card from deck to player.

  • Method Details

    • getCards

      List<UnoCard> getCards()
      Returns the list of cards owned by the player.
      Returns:
      The list of cards.

    • getCardsNumber

      int getCardsNumber()
      Returns the number of cards the player have in hand.
      Returns:
      The number of cards.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns the name of the player.
      Returns:
      Name of the player.

    • isHuman

      boolean isHuman()
      Returns the type of the player, human.
      Returns:
      TSrue if human, false if npc.

    • isNpc

      boolean isNpc()
      Returns the type of the player, npc.
      Returns:
      True if npc, false if human.

    • isWinner

      boolean isWinner()
      Returns if the player is the winner of the match.
      Returns:
      True if the player have no card in hand, false otherwise.

    • mustSayUno

      boolean mustSayUno()
      Returns if the player have one card in hand and must say UNO!
      Returns:
      True if have only one card in hand, false otherwise.

    • takeCard

      void takeCard(UnoCard card)
      Used to give one card from deck to player.
      Parameters:
      card - The card from the deck.
